snippet: A smattering of House Republicans said Wednesday that they would return portions of their office budgets to the nation's treasury to help pay down the national debt.
abstract: A smattering of House Republicans said Wednesday that they would return portions of their office budgets to the nation's treasury to help pay down the national debt.
lead_paragraph: A smattering of House Republicans said Wednesday that they would return portions of their office budgets to the nation's treasury to help pay down the national debt.

headline.main: House Republicans Offer to Return Office Funds
